description:
In today`s episode, the Hero returns with very normal stories about swords and strength. Will he be able to find the answer he needs? Join Basue and Akemi as they assist their patrons with self preservation and self discovery.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Release Yourself (Kangae Sugi yo) / Bad, Bad Whiskey (Yoenai Watashi) / Can`t Get Any Harder (Gaman Sasenaide)
Release Yourself (You`re Thinking Too Much) / Bad, Bad Whiskey (The Me Who Can`t Get Drunk) / Can`t Get Any Harder (Don`t Make Me Wait)
Release Yourself (考えすぎよ) / Bad, Bad Whiskey (酔えないわたし) / Can`t Get Any Harder (ガマンさせないで)
